summary: The diff implements both REQ-11 (bar graph styling) and REQ-12 (table styling) to match SPSS output aesthetics. Bar graphs now feature thin horizontal gridlines, Arial sans-serif fonts, muted SPSS-style colors (#4472C4, #70AD47), minimal spacing, and no shadows/gradients. Tables display thin consistent borders (#D0D0D0), subtle gray header backgrounds (#F5F5F5), Arial fonts, right-aligned numeric values, left-aligned text values, and no rounded corners. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional visualization cards beyond the primary bar graph and table components
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows comments indicating 'Additional visualization with different styling' in BarGraphVisualization.tsx and a 'Data Summary' card with statistics in TableVisualization.tsx that were not requested in the BuildRequest
Hover state styling for table rows was not specified in the requirements, which focus on static SPSS-style aesthetics
